title: GPON HAL Schema
description: GPON HAL JSON Schema definitions. DO NOT modify the contents of this schema file. RDK community team make necessary changes and release

schemaVersion.description: Supported version of the schema. DO NOT modify the value of the version string. HAL operation cannot be performed without correct supported version.

moduleName.description: Module name to be used in JSON message

action.description: List of action strings that can be used in a JSON message that is exchanged between RDK Manager & Vendor Software.

getParameters.description: Supported parameters of 'getParameters' action used by RDK Manager JSON HAL client.

getParametersResponse.description: Supported parameters of 'getParametersResponse' action used by Vendor Software JSON HAL server

getSchema.description: The 'getSchema' action used by RDK Manager JSON HAL client. This action doesn't have any params list.

getSchemaResponse.description: Properties of 'getSchemaResponse' action used by Vendor software JSON HAL server.

setParameters.description: Supported parameters of 'setParameters' action used by RDK Manager JSON HAL client.

subscribeEvent.description: RDK Manager uses this action to subscribe any event that it wants to receive from the Vendor Software

publishEvent.description: Vendor Software uses this action to publish events that are subscribed by the RDK Manager

resultStatusEnumList.description: Result string for any action that is requested

subscribeEventSupportedList.description: Supported data model parameter list for subscribeEvent and publishEvent actions

setParameterSupportedList.description: Supported data model parameter list for setParameters action

setParameterOptionalList.description: Optional data model parameter list for setParameters action

getParameterSupportedList.description: Supported data model parameter list for getParameters action

getParameterOptionalList.description: Optional data model parameter list for getParameters action

ontPhysicalMediaCage.description: Specifies the hardware layout for the optical device, bosa on board or external SFP (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaModuleVendor.description: Informs about the vendor of the optical media (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaModuleName.description: Informs about the module name of the optical module (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaModuleVersion.description: Informs about the hardware version of the optical module (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaModuleFirmwareVersion.description: Informs about the firmware version of the optical module (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaPonMode.description: The passive optical network mode supported by the optical module and ONT (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaConnector.description: The kind of optical connector used in the optical module (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaStatus.description: It shows the current operational status of the optical interface at physical level (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaRedundancyState.description: The redundancy state, it shows the current redundancy state of the optical interface at physical level (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaNominalBitRateDownstream.description: The nominal bit rate for PonMode configured Downstream (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaNominalBitRateUpstream.description: The nominal bit rate for PonMode configured upstream (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaPerformanceThresholdSign.description: This attribute specifies the downstream bit error rate (BER) threshold to detect the SF alarm (Access = Read-Only)
This attribute specifies the downstream bit error rate (BER) threshold to detect the SD alarm, The SD threshold must be lower than the SF threshold (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaRxPowerSignalLevel.description: The optical level received at the optical module (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaRxPowerSignalLevelLowerT.description: The optical level threshold configured to generate a Low signal level alarm (Access = Read-Write)

ontPhysicalMediaRxPowerSignalLevelUpperT.description: The optical level threshold configured to generate an signal overload alarm (Access = Read-Write)

ontPhysicalMediaTxPowerSignalLevel.description: The optical level received at the optical module (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaTxPowerSignalLevelLowerT.description: The optical level threshold configured to generate a Low signal level alarm (Access = Read-Write)

ontPhysicalMediaTxPowerSignalLevelUpperT.description: The optical level threshold configured to generate an signal overload alarm (Access = Read-Write)

ontPhysicalMediaVoltageLevel.description: The voltage measured the optical module (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaCurrentBias.description: The bias current measured at the optical module (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaTemperatureCurrentTemp.description: The current temperature measured at the optical module (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaAlarmMem.description: Message error message, when ONU receives an unknown message (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaAlarmSuf.description: Start up failure, when the ranging of the ONU has failed (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaAlarmSd.description: Signal failed, when BER value is beyond to the one configured at the ONU (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaAlarmSf.description: Signal failed, when BER value is beyond to the one configured at the ONU (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaAlarmLcdg.description: Loss of GEM channel delineation, When GEM fragment delineation is lost according to clause 8.3.2 state machine (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaAlarmTf.description: Transmitter failure, The ONU transmitter is declared in failure when there is no nominal backfacet photocurrent or when the drive currents go beyond the maximum specification (Access = Read-Only)

ontPhysicalMediaAlarmRogue.description: ROGUE ONU, The ONU transmitter is declared as ROGUE ONU (Access = Read-Only)

ontGtcCorrectedFecBytes.description: Count of FEC codewords that contained errors but were corrected by the FEC function. Reference: ITU-T G.988, Clause 9.2.9 and 9.2.22 (Access = Read-Only)

ontGtcCorrectedFecCodeWords.description: Count of FEC codewords that contained errors but were corrected by the FEC function. Reference: ITU-T G.988, Clause 9.2.9 and 9.2.2 (Access = Read-Only)

ontGtcUnCorrectedFecCodeWords.description: Count of FEC codewords that contained errors and could not be corrected by the FEC function. Reference: ITU-T G.988, Clause 9.2.9 and 9.2.22 (Access = Read-Only)

ontGtcGtcTotalFecCodeWords.description: Count of total received code words. Reference: ITU-T G.988, Clause 9.2.9 and 9.2.22 (Access = Read-Only)

ontGtcHecErrorCount.description: The number of FEC words included into a physical burst payload. (Reference: 'FS HEC error count' defined in Table C.14.1 of ITU-T G.9807) (Access = Read-Only)

ontGtcPSBdHecErrors.description: This attribute counts HEC errors in any of the fields of the downstream physical sync block (Reference: 'PSBd HEC error count' defined in Table C.14.1 of ITU-T G.9807,ITU-T G.988, Clause 9.2.15 and 9.2.23) (Access = Read-Only)

ontGtcFrameHecErrors.description: The number of instances of an XGEM frame HEC error. (Reference: 'Count of XGEM frame header HEC errors' in Table C.14.1 of ITU-T G.9807,ITU-T G.988, Clause 9.2.15 and 9.2.23) (Access = Read-Only)

ontGtcFramesLost.description: The number of 4 byte words lost because of an XGEM frame HEC error. Reference: ITU-T G.988, Clause 9.2.15 and 9.2.23 (Access = Read-Only)

ontPloamOnuId.description: The vendor id of the ONU the same as the 4 most significant bytes of the ONU serial number (Access = Read-Only)

ontPloamVendorId.description: The vendor id of the ONU the same as the 4 most significant bytes (Access = Read-Only)

ontPloamSerialNumber.description: ONU serial number as defined in the TC layer (Access = Read-Only)

ontPloamRegistrationState.description: The registration state of ONT (Access = Read-Only)

ontPloamActivationCounter.description: The number of times the ONU pass through O5 between reboots (Access = Read-Only)

ontPloamTxMessageCount.description: The number of PLOAM messages transmitted (Access = Read-Only)

ontPloamRxMessageCount.description: The number of PLOAM messages received (Access = Read-Only)

ontPloamMicErrors.description: The number of packets with MIC errors (Access = Read-Only)

ontGemPortId.description: The identification of the Gem port (Access = Read-Only)

ontGemTrafficType.description: The kind of traffic associated to this port based on what kind of GEM port (Access = Read-Only)

ontGemTransmittedFrames.description: Number of frames transmitted by this port (Access = Read-Only)

ontGemReceivedFrames.description: Number of frames received by this port (Access = Read-Only)

ontGemEthernetFlowIngressTagged.description: Informs the network traffic configuration (Access = Read-Only)

ontGemEthernetFlowEgressTagged.description: Informs the network traffic configuration (Access = Read-Only)

ontVeipInterfaceName.description: Informs about interface name used on top of the Veip to terminate vlan traffic (Access = Read-Only)

ontVeipMeId.description: Identifier of the VEIP ME (Access = Read-Only)

ontVeipAdministrativeState.description: Informs the current administrative state of Veip interface from OMCI domain (Access = Read-Only)

ontVeipOperationalState.description: Informs the current operational state of Veip interface from OMCI domain (Access = Read-Only)

ontVeipInterDomainName.description: This attribute is a character string that provides an optional way to identify the VEIP to a non-OMCI management domain, and expose the default provider brigde configuration. (Access = Read-Only)

ontVeipEthernetFlowIngressTagged.description: Informs the network traffic configuration (Access = Read-Write)

ontVeipEthernetFlowEgressTagged.description: Informs the network traffic configuration (Access = Read-Write)

ontTR69url.description: ACS URI to be used by DNS client to resolve to an IP address (Access = Read-Only)

ontTR69AssociatedTag.description: Tag to transfer information from OMCI domain to TR69 domain (Access = Read-Only)

allOf.description: Conditional block to include data model parameters based on actions
